comments.author: AdelphiA.9287
comments.body: Since the release of the latest patch, the event status for 90% of events has been totally inaccurate! Not sure what’s going on, but right now everywhere is reporting the same thing and all are totally wrong. As an example, the Frozen Maw has been showing as active for the past hour+
